name: Hiding Race 3D
description:
Rediscover the legend of Red Riding Hood through this awesome multiplayer racing game! Run as fast as you can to Grandma's house and beat the competition. But watch out for the wolf lurking along the way! Don't let the wolf catch you on the way!

Slide your finger to run and move around. First one to the house wins. Collect specific items as you run so you can claim the house. Dodge the sneaky wolf trying to catch you!

FEATURES
- Free to play
- Unleash your survival instincts with this highly interactive game
- Every level is unique and brings a fresh, novel experience
- Challenge your survival instincts
- Multiplayer: have fun with players from all over the world!
- Be sneaky: lead the wolf to the other players and flee!
- Be smart: It's not that easy to escape the wolf's grasp!
